Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class GameSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameSystem
  • public abstract class GameSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.

      • resources

        protected SharedResources resources

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSystem

        protected GameSystem​(Signature signature,
                     Limiter limiter)
        Constructs a new system.
        Parameters:
        signature - defines all components an entity must have to be affected by this system
        limiter - determines frequency of updates of this system

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update​(Entity entity,
                            long dt)
        Function invoked on each entity affected by this system.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to update
        dt - ns elapsed since last update to this system

      • before

        public void before​(long dt)
        Function invoked at the beginning of an update cycle. Intended for any static pre-update logic.
        Parameters:
        dt - ns elapsed since last update to this system

      • after

        public void after​(long dt)
        Function invoked at the end of an update cycle. Intended for any static post-update logic.
        Parameters:
        dt - ns elapsed since last update to this system

      • attach

        public void attach()
        Invoked when this system is attached to a GameEngine. Intended for one-time initialization logic, such as registering event receivers.

      • detach

        public void detach()
        Invoked when this system is detached from a GameEngine. Intended for one-time teardown logic, such as clearing event receivers.

      • getSignature

        public Signature getSignature()
        Returns:
        system required component signature

      • getLimiter

        public Limiter getLimiter()
        Returns:
        system update limiter
